comment.author: 42400804@N05
comment._content: possibly Magdalen College School choirboys. I think they are walking up the High Street, before the street had any road markings! www.mcsoxford.org/magdalen-college-choir Turner painted the High Street where these boys are walking www.headington.org.uk/oxon/high/views/turner.htm

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/42400804@N05] Thank you for the information and the links! What you suggest seems quite likely, since Berit Wallenberg took other photographs in High Street close to Magdalen College. Very interesting to read about the Choir and its old history! 
/Anna B.
